summary: This is an email from Allison Stoddart to Arian Sahni regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, providing Webex meeting details for a scheduled meeting. It appears to be legal or administrative coordination related to the case.

persons.name: Allison Stoddart
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case, providing Webex meeting details.

persons.name: Arian Sahni
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as the defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell referenced in the email subject.

connections.description: Stoddart is sending a meeting coordination email to Sahni regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
Stoddart is communicating about the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Email coordination for Maxwell case meeting
events.description: Allison Stoddart sends an email to Arian Sahni with Webex meeting details, regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The email is external correspondence regarding the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
The communication includes detailed Webex meeting instructions for joining a meeting related to the case.
The email is dated November 20, 2021, during the period of Maxwell's trial and legal proceedings.
